get.description: Fetch track titles with a parallelized race strategy and intelligent merging.
Wipe the in-memory cache for testing.
Return global aggregate stats: total sessions, comparisons, artists ranked, avg convergence.

schema.title: Response Get Global Activity Activity Global Get

get.description: Retrieve all sessions for a specific user with summaries.

schema.title: Response Get User Sessions Users  User Id  Sessions Get

get.description: Retrieve session metadata, songs, comparison count, and comparison history.

delete.description: Delete a session and all its associated data.

get.description: Retrieve all songs for a session with their current ratings.

schema.title: Response Get Session Songs Sessions  Session Id  Songs Get

post.description: Record a duel result and update local Elo ratings.

delete.description:
Undo the last comparison in a session.
Restores previous ELO values and deletes the comparison record.
Triggers a ranking recalculation in the background.

post.description:
Initialize a ranking session.
1. Normalizes song titles.
2. Resolves songs in the global catalog.
3. Links songs to the new session.
4. Triggers background deep deduplication.
Import a public Spotify or Apple Music playlist and create a ranking session.

get.description:
List artists that have global leaderboards, ordered by popularity (desc).
total_comparisons = number of distinct users who have ranked that artist (one per user per artist).
Used by the dashboard for "Most popular artists" and to link to each leaderboard.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Max number of artists to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Max number of artists to return

get.description:
Get the global leaderboard for a specific artist.
Returns the top songs ranked by global_elo across all user sessions.

- **artist**: The artist name (must match the name stored in the database exactly)
- **limit**: Maximum number of songs to return (default: 100, max: 500)

If there are pending comparisons and the ranking hasn't updated in the required interval,
this endpoint will trigger a background global ranking update.

Get statistics about an artist's global leaderboard.
Returns metadata without the full song list (lighter weight than full leaderboard).
Artist name must match the name stored in the database exactly.

schema.title: Response Get Artist Leaderboard Stats Leaderboard  Artist  Stats Get

get.description: Check Redis connection for worker queue.
